mapper.select: select WM_CONCAT( a.mobilephone) from sj_tb_admin a where a.id in( select t.user_id from sj_tb_admin_infomsg t where t.regions in(#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and t.type =#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update SJ_TB_ADMIN

PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=DATE},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
